segments.text: Welcome . What can I do for you this morning ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm here on holiday and I don't have a local debit card . Is it possible to withdraw money on my Visa credit card here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , welcome to our country . I trust you are having a pleasant stay ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yes . It's amazing here . I don't think I ever want to go home again !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's the opinion of most people . Do you have your passport with you ? I'll need to see that and you'll need to fill in this withdrawal form .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much would you like to withdraw ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is it OK to withdraw USD ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here's your money , your card and your passport . Please double check the amount for me .
segments.speaker: S1
